name: Back_Alley_Power_Punch
display_help: A Power Punch attack that knocks opponents down.
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

name: Jab
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knocks foes off their feet.

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: Back Alley Brawler has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Back Alley Brawler can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Unyielding
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage.
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Smashing, Lethal Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic)

name: Assault
display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears o
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

display_help: A Power Punch attack that knocks opponents down.
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: Back Alley Brawler can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Back Alley Brawler can Leap to building tops without problem.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Barrage
display_help: A Barrage from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Energy_Transfer
display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Knockback

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Overload
display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

name: Nova
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

name: Entropy_Shield
display_help: Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Fire, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks is increased. The shield also makes you resistant to Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Defense Debuffs and enemy Teleportation for as long as you can keep this toggle power active.
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Teleport, DeBuff DEF

name: Fly
display_help: Citadel can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Teleport
display_help: Teleport

name: Fistful_of_Arrows
display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Explosive_Arrow
display_help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Stunning_Shot
display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Rain_of_Arrows
display_help: You unleash a Rain of Arrows on a targeted location, damaging foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long

name: Entangling_Arrow
display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Arrow
display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate

name: Poison_Gas_Arrow
display_help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time. Recharge: Slow

name: Acid_Arrow
display_help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: EMP_Arrow
display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery

name: Teleport_Arrow
display_help: Manticore has the ability to teleport an arrow directly to his target.

name: Stealth
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Teleport
display_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.

name: Maneuvers
display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

name: Fistful_of_Arrows
display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery

name: Teleport_Arrow
display_help: Manticore has the ability to teleport an arrow directly to his target.

name: Stealth

If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Teleport
display_help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.

name: Maneuvers
display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

name: Levitate
display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

name: Total_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Will_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Psionic_Tornado
display_help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

name: Psychic_Wail
display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

name: Resurrect
display_help: Resurrect a fallen ally.

name: Fortitude
display_help: Heroes can greatly increase an ally's powers as well as increase their perception and resistances.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF, +DMG, +ACC, +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception

name: Adrenalin_Boost
display_help: Dramatically increases an ally's Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate for 90 seconds. Also grants the target high resistance to slow effects. Recharge: Very Long

name: Ethereal
display_help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot be affected by those in normal space.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Ghosts can Fly!

name: Psionic_Blast
display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.

name: Psionic_Crush
display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.

name: Psionic_Torment
display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, and these visions manifest as bleeding wounds. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate.

name: Psionic_Drift
display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)

name: Psionic_Pulse
display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.

name: Psionic_Blade
display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced defense.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)

name: Psionic_Thrust
display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and viciously stab your target. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced resistance to further psionic damage.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Res(Foe, Psionic)

name: Psionic_Nexus
display_help: You create a a nexus of psionic energy at your location.

name: Impenetrable_Mind
display_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.

name: Psionic_Blast
display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.

name: Psionic_Crush
display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.

name: Psionic_Torment
display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, and these visions manifest as bleeding wounds. When the visions end, the targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and recharge rate.

name: Psionic_Drift
display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)

name: Psionic_Pulse
display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.

name: Psionic_Blade
display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced defense.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)

name: Psionic_Thrust
display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and viciously stab your target. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a bleeding wound and reduced resistance to further psionic damage.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Res(Foe, Psionic)

name: Psionic_Nexus
display_help: You create a a nexus of psionic energy at your location.

name: Impenetrable_Mind
display_help: You are naturally protected from psionic damage, gaining a boost to your psionic resistance and defense.

name: Neutrino_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Irradiate
display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Electron_Haze
display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Cosmic_Burst
display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Neutron_Bomb
display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Atomic_Blast
display_help: The Hero has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with an Atomic Blast.

name: Enervating__Field
display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.

name: Lingering_radiation
display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

name: Choking_Cloud
display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long

name: EM_Pulse
display_help: You are Held by the EM Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

name: Overcharge
display_help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special

display_help: Archvillain resistance.

display_help: Special

name: Psionic_Lightning
display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

name: Psionic_Tornado
display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced recharge rate.

name: Psionic_Link_Charging
display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

name: Psionic_Link_Grant
display_help: You are establishing a psionic link to your creator.

name: Psionic_Link
display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

name: Psionic_Link_Self
display_help: You have established a link to your creator, allowing you to exchange energy between each other. This causes healing for both entities.

name: Psionic_Lightning
display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

name: Mesmerize
display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Levitate
display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

name: Mass_Hypnosis
display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

name: Total_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Psychic_Shockwave
display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow

name: Force_Bolt
display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Force_Shield
display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from all attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.

name: Personal_Force_Field
display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Citadel can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Mesmerize
display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Levitate
display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

name: Mass_Hypnosis
display_help: The Hero has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

name: Total_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Psychic_Shockwave
display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow

name: Force_Bolt
display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Force_Shield
display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from all attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.

name: Personal_Force_Field
display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Citadel can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Jab
display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

name: Punch
display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Haymaker
display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Hammer_of_Justice
display_help: Statesman calls upon the power of the gods to strike down upon you.

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Zeus_Lightning_Bolt
display_help: Statesman can call upon the power of Zeus in time of need.

display_help: Archvillain resistance.

display_help: Citadel can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Hero can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Hero can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Thunderous_Blast
display_help: The Hero's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

name: Havoc_Punch
display_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.

name: Lightning_Clap
display_help: You can clap your hands together to release a violent Lightning Clap. The Lightning Clap can knock down most nearby foes, Disorienting many of them. Lightning Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

name: Thunder_Strike
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Synaptic_Strike
display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of fists and electricity to smash your foe.

name: Whirlwind
display_help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.
